gift.giftCardInfo: * Gift cards are valid for 24 months from the date of purchase. Gift cards cannot be replaced or refunded if lost or stolen. Gift cards cannot be returned or exchanged for cash, except where required by law. In the event that a purchase made with a gift card is returned, the original card will be credited. Discounts, promo codes or coupons cannot be used to purchase gift cards

customerFeedback.customerfeed: I had a brilliant experience designing and ordering an engagement ring from Austen & Blake! I originally went into the...
bookApp.slotsInfo: Our appointment slots are finalised over the phone, so please expect a confirmation call if you would like to make sure your slot is reserved.
hub.description: The most romantic moment deserves a ring just as special. Explore our exquisite selection and choose the perfect engagement ring for your loved one.
hub.CutShapeDescription: Contrary to popular belief, diamond cut and diamond shape are  different things. Shapes like oval, round, and princess describe the geometric shape of the gemstone, and the cut describes the angle and facets of the stone that make it sparkle – the highest quality  gemstones have an ‘ideal’ or ‘excellent’ cut. Cut defines what the shape of a rough diamond will be.
hub.LabsDiamondSubtitle: A natural diamond is the perfect choice if you’re looking for something rare that holds its value, where as a lab diamond is a more sustainable, affordable option if you’re on a budget. We also  offer a wide variety of gemstone engagement rings to choose from too, the possibilities are endless!

dfCart.recommendedDescription: Jewellery can accumulate dirt and grime however carefully worn.Keep your jewellery sparkling clean with our range of cleaning products.
dfCart.stackFrametext: Free Delivery & Collection, Hassle-Free Returns Estimated  Delivery 2-3 working weeks. Need it Sooner? Call us 020 7138 3672
dfCart.insuranceOptionaltext: This insurance is optional and will meet the demands and needs of a UK resident requiring insurance for jewellery or watches in the United Kingdom, Channel Islands and Isle of Man plus up to  30 consecutive days elsewhere in the world any one trip.
dfCart.planVaries: The plan varies in price from £99 for 1 year to £400 for 5 years and covers the following repairs and services. The plan covers the following repairs and services.
dfCart.retipping: Re-tipping of claws once per 12 months
dfCart.rhodium: Rhodium plating for rings in white gold, once per 12 months
dfCart.resettingtext: Resetting/tightening diamonds and gemstones, once per 12months
dfCart.importantNotice: Important notice: Whilst many home insurance policies may cover certain pieces of jewellery or watches we would advise all customers to check their policies closely. Certain household policies have restrictions on watch and jewellery cover, and may include limitations such as, no accidental damage cover, no cover outside of the home or cover for holidays abroad. They may also restrict your choice of jeweller for repair or replacement. In the event of a household insurance claim, you may be expected to pay an policy excess and any claims made may affect your future premiums.
dfCart.policywording: See policy wording for full details of cover and exclusions
dfCart.itsnotpossible: It is not possible to mix 1 year and 3 year terms on the same policy
dfCart.initialterm: This insurance is NOT renewable after the initial term
dfCart.coolingOff: There is a 14-day cooling off period. For goods returned under our 30-day return policy, only a pro-rated refund can be made for months remaining after this period.
dfCart.noCover: No cover for free gifts or accessories
dfCart.noCoverItem: No cover for items left in unattended baggage or unattended vehicles
dfCart.noCoverwear: No cover for wear and tear
dfCart.clickHeredownload: Click here to download the full policy wording document (PDF)
dfCart.clickHereInsurance: Click here to download the insurance product information document (PDF)
dfCart.subjectToterms: * Subject to terms and conditions of the policy
dfCart.yearPolicies: For 3 year policies, protection is included against price inflation on replacement items (see certificate terms for details)
dfCart.allClaims: All claims are processed through Diamonds Factory (repair or replacement)
dfCart.worldwideCover: Worldwide cover (up to 30 consecutive days abroad)
dfCart.ourUkCustomertext: Our UK customers can insure their purchase with MarchGuard cover from T H March, providers of specialist jewellery and watch insurance since 1887.
dfCart.whiteGoldOval: White Gold Oval Halo Diamond Engagement Ring
dfCart.addTheft: Add theft, damage & loss Insurance from T H March
dfCart.certificatedetails: It is important you read the certificate as this details the terms, conditions and any restrictions in cover.
dfCart.unlikelyEvent: In the unlikely event that you may wish to make a complaint,this should be directed to T H March.The complaints procedure is detailed in your insurance documentation.
dfCart.checkedFinancial: This may be checked on the Financial Services Register on the FCA’s website
dfCart.insuranceAdministeredTH: The insurance is administered by T H March & Co. Limited, Hare Park House, Yelverton Business Park,Yelverton, Devon, PL20 7LS, and they are authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA)
dfCart.insuranceOptional: This insurance is optional and will meet the demands and needs of a UK resident requiring insurance for jewelleryor watches in the United Kingdom, Channel Islands and Isle of Man plus up to 30 consecutive days elsewhere in the world any one trip.
dfCart.importantjewelleryInfo: important that you read the Jewellery Care Plan and terms and conditions as this details the terms, conditions and any restrictions in cover.
dfCart.forMoreInfo: For more information visit the Jewellery Care Plan page here
dfCart.ringSizingsUp: Ring sizings up to 2 sizes, maximum once per policy (does not cover reshanking of rings; certain styles of rings are not suitable for resizing and are excluded from the resizing service under this Plan)
dfCart.claspReplacement: Clasp replacement (same as original), once per 12 months
dfCart.soldering: Soldering earring posts, once per 12 months
dfCart.replacementbacks: Replacement backs on earrings, once per 12 months
dfCart.cleaningInspection: Cleaning, inspection and polishing per 12 months
